name: Piggy GO - Clash of Coin
description:
Welcome to Piggy GO, roll your destiny and experience the global trip with your friends!
Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, fates and raids to build your city to the top!

Game Features
◆ Earn gold to promote to 🏆 Board King 🏆 any time. Build your city, the higher level the more rewards.
◆ Funny board and real-time interaction will remind you the fun of Monopoly. Earning gold is easy and addictive!
◆ Play with millions of players worldwide! Too many coin? Go Raid, 🤩 Coin Dozer 🤩! Attack you? Go Revenge, 💣 Piggy Boom 💣!
◆ Collect cards to complete sets and win great rewards. Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all!
◆ Build and view the beautiful scenery worldwide: cool Los Angeles, night Shanghai...

Follow Piggy GO on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyGOTravel

Are you having problems? Please contact us in the game by clicking on the Menu > Settings > Help or email us.
Email: piggygo@forevernine.com

Love travelling or adventure?
🔥Free Download🔥 to experience more!
